directive_ref: CEO DIRECTIVE WAVE 15/15A - AUTONOMOUS GOLDEN NEEDLE HUNT WITH SOURCE ATTRIBUTION

sources.snippet_or_excerpt: Crypto markets were already on edge heading into President Donald Trump's 9 PM EST primetime address to the nation from the White House.
Crypto had a rough November. The pain is persisting into December — and that could signal trouble ahead for the stock market.
AI-powered sentiment signals give everyday traders the same edge institutions use. Delivered as clear, data-driven signals.
More traders are turning to bots as the always-on crypto market demands faster execution than humans can deliver.
Bitcoin slipped toward $86000 as Asian markets opened lower, extending a risk-off move from Wall Street's tech-led sell-off.

hypothesis_content.title: Mysterious Trader Exhaustion Signal
hypothesis_content.statement: Large 'mysterious trader' selling ahead of events creates temporary oversupply that exhausts within 90 minutes, with price recovering 70%+ of the pre-event drop as smaller participants absorb the liquidity.
hypothesis_content.rationale: Large traders front-running events create artificial selling pressure. Once their orders are filled, natural bid-side liquidity reasserts itself unless fundamental conditions have actually deteriorated.
entry_conditions: BTC drops 2-4% in 30 minutes preceding major scheduled event
No corresponding negative news beyond 'mysterious traders selling' narrative
Order book shows large ask walls (>100 BTC) being consumed steadily
Volume profile shows selling concentrated in 2-3 large blocks

exit_conditions.stop_loss: Price breaks below pre-event low after 90 minutes

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: Selling continues beyond 90 minutes with increasing volume, indicating genuine fundamental selling rather than positioning adjustment.
